name: The Typing Of The Shark
description:
The Typing Of The Shark is a typing game that will put you in the fatty skin of a space seal defending it's space ship from space sharks.

Type the words that appear on top of the enemy sharks to kill them.

Enjoy!

Credits:

  • Programmer: Mathias Guul
  • Artist: Pol Jandula, Felip Domingo, Victor Freixes
  • Designer: Pol Jandula
  • Sound: Victor Freixes
